name: 2 Sqaures
description:
this game was made for the go godot jam 3. in this game you play as a sqaure and have to fight the enemy square. after every round both squares evolve and get a new and better weapon. you can play locally with your friends or if you are like me who doesn't have those, then you can play with a bot.

the sprites and art assets are made by me and sound effects are from mixkit.co and zapsplat.com
